data.name: Destroyer: The U-Boat Hunter
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT ALSO THESE GAME:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1605420/American_Commando/


About the Game

Check out also this games!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1451050/Sherman_Commander/

Destroyer: The U-boat hunter is an innovative, cross-genre destroyer simulation which truthfully depicts the struggle of escort groups protecting allied convoys against German U-boats during the Battle of the Atlantic. Take full control of a Fletcher-class destroyer, using authentic instruments and attack procedures to fully savor the experience in simulation mode, or enjoy complete awareness and more action in tactical mode, without the need to understand complex devices or realistic procedures.



Regardless of the mode, Destroyer combines the thrill of commanding an anti-submarine warship with the tactical challenge of managing a whole escort group protecting convoys against relentless wolfpacks. The game goes to great lengths to appeal to fans of realism and immersion, at the same time offering a great experience for the more casual-oriented fans of the genre as well.

Whether a milsim veteran or a fledgling captain, immerse yourself in a cinematic naval warfare experience and feel the thrill of the hunt!

data.short_description: Destroyer: the U-Boat Hunter is an interactive war thriller which seamlessly blends realistic WW2 anti-submarine warfare simulation with immersive tactical gameplay. Take command of a Fletcher-class destroyer and lead your escort group against German U-boats in the Battle of the Atlantic!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Russian, German, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 1GB (720p Low), GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB (1080p Low) or AMD equivalents
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB (1080p High), GeForce GTX 1070 8GB (1080p Extreme) or AMD equivalents
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
